name: Blizzard Battle.net
description:
Blizzard-app para INTEL 

Debian 10 64bit

Starcraft, Diablo 3, Heroes of Storm, StarCraft 2, Heartstone (pronto)
notes:
Primero que nada instala las siguientes dependencias:
libgnutls30:i386 libldap-2.4-2:i386 libgpg-error0:i386 libsqlite3-0:i386

Instalar DXVK desde winetricks si su chip INTEL es Broadwell, Skylake, Kabylake.

Heroes of Storm:
Las Librerías de DirectX11 incluidos dentro del directorio del Juego específicamente en la Carpeta Support64 las copiamos en la Carpeta System32.


d3dcompiler_47.dll y d3dx11_42.dl

files.instalador: N/A:Please select the Blizzardapp setup file

content:
files:
- setup:
    filename: Battle.net-Setup.exe
    url: https://www.battle.net/download/getInstallerForGame?os=win&locale=enUS&version=LIVE&gameProgram=BATTLENET_APP&id=1080421053.1563775333
- instalador: N/A:Please select the Blizzardapp setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Battle.net/Battle.net.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    description: Installing DirectX 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    description: Installing d3dcompiler43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
- task:
    app: vcrun2017
    description: Installing VisualC2017
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
- task:
    app: win7
    description: Cambiando a Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Blizzard App.
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
